Junior Game Developer (Unity / C#)

Hello! I'm Riccardo Cruanes Rossini, an Italian programmer with experience in back-end Java development. I develop gameplay systems and prototypes in Unity, focusing on modular C# code and simple pixel art to visualize mechanics.

Projects

Codino (2025)

Team: 1 1 week

Codino is a small Educational Prototype developed for an elementary school as part of Cremona Code Week. The project introduces first graders to logical thinking through a grid-based, command-driven movement system, where players place and execute instructions to guide a robot. The focus is on sequential logic, visual programming concepts, and clear player feedback in a safe, educational environment.

Annie's Adventure (2025)

Team: 1 3 weeks

Annie's Adventure is a small 2D platformer developed in Unity as a gameplay-focused prototype. The project explores responsive character movement, grappling-based traversal, and modular enemy behaviors, with an emphasis on clean state management and player feedback.
